Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class ServerClientConnection

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.ServerClientConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ServerClientConnection extends Object implements Runnable
Class that manages a connection between the server and a single client.

    • prepareSocket

      Prepares socket buffer and timeout; public for testing purposes
      Throws:

    • run

      public void run()
      Main method of the ServerClientConnection thread that receives Clients messages and sort them. Don't call this method directly but use start() instead.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(Message message)
      Writes the Message object to the buffer and sends it.
      Parameters:
      message - the message that is going to be serialized and sent to the client

    • askToCloseConnection

      public void askToCloseConnection()
      Sets the Connection to stop receiving and to close socket and streams.

    • deserialize

      public void deserialize(String messageString)
      With the passed string, reads the message type and does the correct actions with that message. If the message is a User message, asks the Lobby Handler to update the User object. If the message is a Still Alive message, resets the Still Alive timer. There are some steps in which only a certain type of messages are accepted: first step: only a handshake can be accepted (still_alive also) second step: only a user can be accepted (still_alive also) third step: when game starts, handshake and user are not accepted.
      Parameters:
      messageString - the message received by the Client, that is going to be deserialized and read

    • notifyError

      public void notifyError(String message)
      Sends the error message to the client for a specific message type.
      Parameters:
      message - message of the error

    • notifyDisconnection

      public void notifyDisconnection(String user_that_disconnected)
      Sends the error message to the client for a disconnection, specifying who disconnected.
      Parameters:
      user_that_disconnected - user that disconnected

    • resetTimer

      public void resetTimer()
      Resets Still Alive timer to its initial value.
